name: Two-handed
description: Increase the weapons damage by 3 and its speed by 5.

name: Deadly
description: Allows to use the damage effect with the same name.

name: Piercing
description: Allows to use the damage effect with the same name.

name: Stunning
description: Allows to use the damage effect with the same name.

name: Irritating
description: Allows to use the damage effect with the same name.

name: Interrupting
description: Allows to use the damage effect with the same name.

name: Fast
description: Reduces the weapons speed by one. Can't be combined with massive.

name: Automatic
description: Allows to use burst abilities. Can only be applied on weapons with a magazine capacity of at least 10.

name: Non lethal
description: The weapon does mental instead of physical damage.

name: Defensive
description: Add a bonus of one to parry checks with this weapon.

name: Large magazine
description: Doubles magazine size. Can only be applied on weapons with magazine.

name: Modular
description: The weapon can be disassembled. This grants an advantage on stealth checks to conceal the weapon.

name: Hardned
description: The weapon is more durable and can be used to parry melee attacks.

name: Precise
description: The weapon grants a bonus of 1 to attack checks.

name: Elegant
description: Reduces the penalty from the usage of special abilities by 2.

name: Massive
description: Increases speed and damage of the weapon by 2.

name: Heavy caliber
description: Increases damage of the weapon by 1 while reducing the magazine capacity by half.

name: Monofilament
description: Reduces enemy armor by half. Can't be combined with piercing.

name: Energy weapon
description: The blade of the weapon consists of pure energy that is contained by force fields. It needs 2 additional ticks to switch the weapon on or off within another action. The weapon be kept active for 60 ticks. Spend an additional slot to double this time. The damage of the weapon is increased by 1 and it gains the piercing quality.

name: Dangerous
description: Increase the weapons damage by 1.

name: Extended range
description: Doubles the range of the weapon.

name: Telescopic sight
description: Reduce the range penalty on extreme range by half.

name: Reflex scope
description: Reduces close range by 1 and also reduce the penalty by 1.

name: Quick loader
description: Reduces reload time by 4 ticks.

name: Painful
description: All toughness checks that are cause by an attack of this weapon suffer a penalty of 4.

name: Welding mode
description: The weapon can be configured to function as welder.

name: Spread
description: Halves weapon range. Checks to dodge this weapon have a disadvantage. Hits other engaged targets for half the damage.

name: Silent
description: Weapon is silenced and harder to detect when fired.

name: Explosive
description: Increase damage by 2. Hits other engaged targets for half the damage. Thrown weapons get a base damage of 6 and do not take the strength into account any more.

name: Unwieldy
description: Checks with this weapon suffer a penalty of 2.

name: Improvised
description: Damage reduced by 1.

name: Weak
description: Enemy armor counts as 2 points higher. Only when wearing armor.

name: Instable
description: After each attack roll 2d10. The weapon will be blocked due to malfunction for 10 ticks if the result of the roll is below 9. The weapon is completely damaged and can't be used until repaired if the result is below 4.

name: Fitted
description: Reduce penalty by one.

name: Camouflage
description: Enhanced adaptable surfaces allow this armor to mimic the environment. Grants you an advantage on stealth checks.

name: Reflecting
description: Increase protection value by one against beam weapons.

name: Ballistic
description: Increase protection value by one against projectile weapons.

name: Sealed
description: The armor protects form environmental hazards and has an build in 15 min oxygen supply.

name: Oxigen tank
description: Requires the sealed modification and allows to use the armor like a Vacc suite with 4 hours of oxygen supply.

name: Padded
description: Increase protection value by one against thrown and archaic ranged weapons.

name: Hardened
description: Increase protection value by one against meele weapons.

name: Reinforced
description: Increase protection and penalty by one.
